video.title: Million Dollar Rooms Collection
video.synopsis: Join Carter Oosterhouse as he tours some of the world's most luxurious and innovative spaces, from dazzling indoor pools to palatial master suites.

episodes.synopsis: Peek into an Australian kitchen with some serious bling, a Spanish mansion with a bathroom that rivals Fort Knox and more deluxe kitchens and baths.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Kitchens & Bath

episodes.synopsis: Get a taste of Hollywood luxury at Mark Wahlberg's estate, where a boxing ring is the crown jewel in an amazing outdoor complex.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Outdoor Spaces

episodes.synopsis: Rapper 50 Cent gives Las Vegas a run for its money with the game rooms and nightclub in his sprawling estate.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Vegas Playground

episodes.synopsis: Ride on a custom-built backyard train, step into a two-story library that would dazzle any scholar, and mellow out in a man cave full of ancient art.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Train Station

episodes.synopsis: Tour a California master suite fit for French royalty, a Florida bathroom with its own grotto and the world's largest residential pool in Texas.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Master Bath

episodes.synopsis: Check out a 20,000-gallon home aquarium, a three-story indoor climbing wall and a $10 million pool with its own ecosystem.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Aquarium Room

episodes.synopsis: It's party time as Carter scopes out a swanky in-home nightclub, a private casino and a lavish indoor pool in New York City.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Disco

episodes.synopsis: Carter checks out a Malibu villa's pricy pool hall, an Indiana home's distinctive great room and a Texas family's sports complex with courts galore.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Sports Room

episodes.synopsis: Carter visits a lavish Italian estate in Florida, a vintage casino room in California and a two-story sports facility complete with a water slide.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Master Suite

episodes.synopsis: Carter visits a high-end garage with one of the rarest cars in the world, a Yankees player's sweet lounge and a glowing underground temple to wine.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Car Garage

episodes.synopsis: Step inside a piazza thousands of miles from Italy, float on a master suite above a Hawaiian lagoon, and dip into an extravagant French wine cellar.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Californian Piazza

episodes.synopsis: Step inside a Texas mansion with a spa fit for an emperor and a round San Diego home that puts a new spin on luxury.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Roman Bath

episodes.synopsis: Explore a baseball star's major-league yard, a Las Vegas master suite that defies gravity and an underwater media room that Poseidon would envy.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Underwater Room

episodes.synopsis: Tour a deluxe family theater in Aspen, a Singapore living room with its own car lift and a Texas backyard that's a golfer's paradise.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Aspen Theater

episodes.synopsis: The home of fashion moguls Max and Lubov Azria of BCBG offers one-of-a-kind style, while an iconic mansion serves up a slice of New York history.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Rooms Tour
